author: The Globe And Mail
title: Allstate to spend $30-million providing car insurance rebates to all Canadian customers
description: Allstate to spend $30-million providing car insurance rebates to all Canadian customers theglobeandmail.com
content:
An Allstate Company sign is seen in an April 7, 2020, file photo.
Nam Y. Huh/The Associated Press
Allstate Insurance Company of Canada is spending $30-million in car insurance rebates for all its customers regardless of their financial situation during the … [+1428 chars]
